Package de.frauas.jdemandmodel.appliance

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Activity
    The activity statistics of the CREST model only include values for the six categories TV, Cooking, Laundry, WashDress, Iron and HouseClean.
    Appliance
    This class is the representation of an appliance.
    ApplianceData
    This class encapsulates five attributes of an appliance: ON power: power[W] when the appliance is turned on OFF power: power[W] when the appliance is turned off cycle time: time[min] a cycle of this appliance being turned on lasts restart delay: time[min] to delay before this appliance can be turned on again after being turned off scale factor: probability scaling factor to achieve a certain amount of on-power-cycles per year
    ApplianceManager
    This class is used for managing the appliances that will be used for the simulation.
    CSVApplianceFactory
    This class is for creating appliances.
    ElectricSpaceHeating
    An electric space heating is a special appliance, where the probability of being turned on depends on the month of the year.
    ExampleApplianceAndOccupancyRun  
    ExampleApplianceFactory  
    ExampleApplianceManager  
    ExampleApplianceRun  
    ExampleMultipleAppliances  
    ExamplePowerCycle  
    StorageHeater
    A storage heater is a special appliance, where the probability of being turned on depends on the month of the year and the time of day.
    TestAppliance  
    TestApplianceData  
    TestCSVApplianceFactory  
    TestPowerCycleClasses  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Device
    This enum type lists the names, activity value and row of all appliances.
